Assets

Assets? Like what?

Well, we can first start off with the "why". So, why assets and resources? Well, you can't get much done without them otherwise, of course! Resources refer to things such as softwares and other things that we use to make game devving easier, and so, here we have compiled a list of resources that we have used in games of our very own!

Gamespawn Certified Assets for Gamespawn Purposes

Gamespawn Assets Drive

General

Google Doc




Everyone knows what Google Docs is but just in case you don't, Google Docs is a text editor



Gamespawn Projects that use this: The Witches of Luminoire



Tutorial Link(s): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WKeNJh_gIJU&ab_channel=olenvn



Download Link(s): https://rainbowjellie.itch.io/at-the-heart-of-the-forest
